name: Looney Nights
description:
Looney Nights is a stress management game that takes place in a cartoony world where cartoony things happen.

It is your job to ensure that the customers of the nightclub in Toony Loony Town are satisfyed and kept in check. With the nightclub being a bar, dance floor and show stage, theres all sorts of wrong that can go down, and its up to you to stop it. Can you make it through a business week at the club or will it have to shut down because of your inability to keep it running and its customers safe?

http://mywebspace.quinnipiac.edu/jmpandolfo/410/Lo...
